duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive sales strategies to drive revenue growth and promote catering services.
Lead a team of sales specialists, fostering collaboration and guiding their efforts towards achieving set goals.
Identify and pursue opportunities for lead generation, nurturing client relationships, and securing catering contracts.
Plan and oversee catering events, ensuring seamless execution and customer satisfaction.
Engage in negotiation and sales activities to maximize catering revenue and profitability.
Measure and report on the performance of sales strategies, using data-driven insights to continuously improve performance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Marketing, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
